052/**
053 *  This class uses the programmatic approach for the CLI feature from the
054 *  config project.
055 *
056 *  @version $Id: CodedCLI.java 1053 2023-03-11 00:10:49Z tquadrat $
057 *  @extauthor Thomas Thrien - thomas.thrien@tquadrat.org
058 *  @UMLGraph.link
059 *  @since 0.1.0
060 */
061@SuppressWarnings( "ClassWithTooManyFields" )
062@ClassVersion( sourceVersion = "$Id: CodedCLI.java 1053 2023-03-11 00:10:49Z tquadrat $" )
063@API( status = STABLE, since = "0.1.0" )
064@PlaygroundClass
065public final class CodedCLI
066{

202        /*--------------*\
203    ====** Constructors **=====================================================
204        \*--------------*/
205    /**
206     *  Create an instance of {@code CodedCLI}.
207     */
208    @SuppressWarnings( "RedundantNoArgConstructor" )
209    public CodedCLI() { /* Does nothing */ }
210
211        /*---------*\
212    ====** Methods **==========================================================
213        \*---------*/
214    /**
215     *  Adds a CLI definition to the list.
216     *
217     *  @param  <T> The property type.
218     *  @param  cliDefinitions  The list of the CLI definitions.
219     *  @param  currentIndex    The current value for the argument index.
220     *  @param  propertyClass   The class of the property.
221     *  @param  optSetter   The option setter.
222     *  @param  argSetter   The argument setter.
223     *  @return The next argument index.
224     */
225    private final <T> int addDefinition( final Collection<? super CLIDefinition> cliDefinitions, final int currentIndex, final Class<? extends T> propertyClass, final BiConsumer<String,T> optSetter, final BiConsumer<String,T> argSetter )
226    {
227        final var stringConverter = StringConverter.forClass( propertyClass ).orElseThrow( () -> new IllegalArgumentException( format( "No StringConverter for '%s'", propertyClass.getName()) ) );
228        final CmdLineValueHandler<T> optHandler = new SimpleCmdLineValueHandler<>( optSetter, stringConverter );
229        final CmdLineValueHandler<T> argHandler = new SimpleCmdLineValueHandler<>( argSetter, stringConverter );
230
231        final var propertyName = propertyClass.getSimpleName();
232        final var optionName = format( "--o%s", propertyName );
233
234        cliDefinitions.add(
235            new CLIArgumentDefinition(
236                propertyName, // The property name; not used in this context
237                currentIndex, // The index for the argument
238                format( "The argument %s", propertyName ), // The usage text for the help
239                "MSGKEY_Argument", // The resource bundle key; not used here
240                propertyName.toUpperCase( ROOT ), // The meta variable for the help
241                true, // Arguments are usually required
242                argHandler, // The value handler
243                false, // The argument is not multi-value
244                null   // No special format
245            ) );
246
247        cliDefinitions.add(
248            new CLIOptionDefinition(
249                propertyName, // The property name; not used in this context
250                List.of( optionName ), // The option names
251                format( "The option for %s", propertyName ), // The usage text for the help
252               "MSGKEY_Option", // The resource bundle key; not used here
253                format( "%S_VALUE", propertyName ), // The meta variable of the option value for the help
254                false, // Options are usually optional …
255                optHandler, // The value handler
256                false, // The option value is not multi-value
257                null// No special format
258            ) );
259
260        //---* Update the argument index *-------------------------------------
261        final var retValue = currentIndex + 1;
262
263        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
264        return retValue;
265    }   //  addDefinition()
266
267    /**
268     *  Does the programs work.
269     *
270     *  @param  args    The command line arguments.
271     *  @return {@code true} if the execution was successful, {@code false}
272     *      otherwise.
273     *  @throws IOException Cannot write the usage.
274     */
275    @SuppressWarnings( {"BooleanMethodNameMustStartWithQuestion", "UseOfSystemOutOrSystemErr"} )
276    public final boolean execute( final String... args ) throws IOException
277    {
278        var argIndex = 0;
279        final Collection<CLIDefinition> cliDefinitions = new ArrayList<>();
280
281        //---* BigDecimal *----------------------------------------------------
282        final BiConsumer<String,BigDecimal> bigDecimalArgSetter = ($,value) -> m_BigDecimalArg = value;
283        final BiConsumer<String,BigDecimal> bigDecimalOptSetter = ($,value) -> m_BigDecimalOpt = value;
284        argIndex = addDefinition( cliDefinitions, argIndex, BigDecimal.class, bigDecimalOptSetter, bigDecimalArgSetter );
285
286        //---* BigInteger *----------------------------------------------------
287        final BiConsumer<String,BigInteger> bigIntegerArgSetter = ($,value) -> m_BigIntegerArg = value;
288        final BiConsumer<String,BigInteger> bigIntegerOptSetter = ($,value) -> m_BigIntegerOpt = value;
289        argIndex = addDefinition( cliDefinitions, argIndex, BigInteger.class, bigIntegerOptSetter, bigIntegerArgSetter );
290
291        //---* Byte *----------------------------------------------------------
292        BiConsumer<String,Byte> byteArgSetter = ($,value) -> m_BytePrimitiveArg = value.byteValue();
293        BiConsumer<String,Byte> byteOptSetter = ($,value) -> m_BytePrimitiveOpt = value.byteValue();
294        argIndex = addDefinition( cliDefinitions, argIndex, byte.class, byteOptSetter, byteArgSetter );
295        byteArgSetter = ($,value) -> m_ByteArg = value;
296        byteOptSetter = ($,value) -> m_ByteOpt = value;
297        argIndex = addDefinition( cliDefinitions, argIndex, Byte.class, byteOptSetter, byteArgSetter );
298
299        //---* char and Character *--------------------------------------------
300        BiConsumer<String,Character> charArgSetter = ($,value) -> m_CharArg = value.charValue();
301        BiConsumer<String,Character> charOptSetter = ($,value) -> m_CharOpt = value.charValue();
302        argIndex = addDefinition( cliDefinitions, argIndex, char.class, charOptSetter, charArgSetter );
303        charArgSetter = ($,value) -> m_CharacterArg = value;
304        charOptSetter = ($,value) -> m_CharacterOpt = value;
305        argIndex = addDefinition( cliDefinitions, argIndex, Character.class, charOptSetter, charArgSetter );
306
307        //---* Charset *-------------------------------------------------------
308        final BiConsumer<String,Charset> charsetArgSetter = ($,value) -> m_CharsetArg = value;
309        final BiConsumer<String,Charset> charsetOptSetter = ($,value) -> m_CharsetOpt = value;
310        argIndex = addDefinition( cliDefinitions, argIndex, Charset.class, charsetOptSetter, charsetArgSetter );
311
312        /*
313         *  The types requiring special handling.
314         */
315        //---* Boolean *-------------------------------------------------------
316        BiConsumer<String,Boolean> booleanArgSetter = ($,value) -> m_BooleanPrimitiveArg = value.booleanValue();
317        BiConsumer<String,Boolean> booleanOptSetter = ($,value) -> m_BooleanPrimitiveOpt = value.booleanValue();
318        CmdLineValueHandler<Boolean> booleanArgHandler = new BooleanValueHandler( booleanArgSetter );
319        CmdLineValueHandler<Boolean> booleanOptHandler = new BooleanValueHandler( booleanOptSetter );
320        cliDefinitions.add(
321            new CLIArgumentDefinition(
322                "boolean", // The property name; not used in this context
323                argIndex++, // The index for the argument
324                "The argument for boolean", // The usage text for the help
325                "MSGKEY_Argument", // The resource bundle key; not used here
326                "boolean", // The meta variable for the help
327                true, // Arguments are usually required
328                booleanArgHandler, // The value handler
329                false, // The argument is not multi-value
330                null // No special format
331            ) );
332        cliDefinitions.add(
333            new CLIOptionDefinition(
334                "boolean", // The property name; not used in this context
335                List.of( "--oboolean" ), // The option names
336                "The option for boolean", // The usage text for the help
337                "MSGKEY_Option", // The resource bundle key; not used here
338                "boolean_VALUE", // The meta variable of the option value for the help
339                false, // Options are usually optional …
340                booleanOptHandler, // The value handler
341                false, // The option value is not multi-value
342                null // No special format
343            ) );
344        cliDefinitions.add(
345            new CLIOptionDefinition(
346                "boolean", // The property name; not used in this context
347                List.of( "--oboolean2" ), // The option names
348                "The option for boolean", // The usage text for the help
349                "MSGKEY_Option", // The resource bundle key; not used here
350                "boolean_VALUE", // The meta variable of the option value for the help
351                false, // Options are usually optional …
352                booleanOptHandler, // The value handler
353                false, // The option value is not multi-value
354                null // No special format
355            ) );
356        booleanArgSetter = ($,value) -> m_BooleanArg = value;
357        booleanOptSetter = ($,value) -> m_BooleanOpt = value;
358        booleanArgHandler = new BooleanValueHandler( booleanArgSetter );
359        booleanOptHandler = new BooleanValueHandler( booleanOptSetter );
360        cliDefinitions.add(
361            new CLIArgumentDefinition(
362                "Boolean", // The property name; not used in this context
363                argIndex++, // The index for the argument
364                "The argument for boolean", // The usage text for the help
365                "MSGKEY_Argument", // The resource bundle key; not used here
366                "BOOLEAN", // The meta variable for the help
367                true, // Arguments are usually required
368                booleanArgHandler, // The value handler
369                false, // The argument is not multi-value
370                null // No special format
371            ) );
372        cliDefinitions.add(
373            new CLIOptionDefinition(
374                "Boolean", // The property name; not used in this context
375                List.of( "--oBoolean" ), // The option names
376                "The option for boolean", // The usage text for the help
377                "MSGKEY_Option", // The resource bundle key; not used here
378                "BOOLEAN_VALUE", // The meta variable of the option value for the help
379                false, // Options are usually optional …
380                booleanOptHandler, // The value handler
381                false, // The option value is not multi-value
382                null // No special format
383            ) );
384        cliDefinitions.add(
385            new CLIOptionDefinition(
386                "Boolean", // The property name; not used in this context
387                List.of( "--oBoolean2" ), // The option names
388                "The option for boolean", // The usage text for the help
389                "MSGKEY_Option", // The resource bundle key; not used here
390                "BOOLEAN_VALUE", // The meta variable of the option value for the help
391                false, // Options are usually optional …
392                booleanOptHandler, // The value handler
393                false, // The option value is not multi-value
394                null // No special format
395            ) );
396
397        //---* String *--------------------------------------------------------
398        final BiConsumer<String,String> stringArgSetter = ($,value) -> m_StringArg = value;
399        final BiConsumer<String,String> stringOptSetter = ($,value) -> m_StringOpt = value;
400        final CmdLineValueHandler<String> stringArgHandler = new StringValueHandler( stringArgSetter );
401        final CmdLineValueHandler<String> stringOptHandler = new StringValueHandler( stringOptSetter );
402        //noinspection UnusedAssignment
403        cliDefinitions.add(
404            new CLIArgumentDefinition(
405                "String", // The property name; not used in this context
406                argIndex++, // The index for the argument
407                "The argument for String", // The usage text for the help
408                "MSGKEY_Argument", // The resource bundle key; not used here
409                "STRING", // The meta variable for the help
410                true, // Arguments are usually required
411                stringArgHandler, // The value handler
412                false, // The argument is not multi-value
413                null // No special format
414            ) );
415        cliDefinitions.add(
416            new CLIOptionDefinition(
417                "String", // The property name; not used in this context
418                List.of( "--oString" ), // The option names
419                "The option for String", // The usage text for the help
420                "MSGKEY_Option", // The resource bundle key; not used here
421                "STRING_VALUE", // The meta variable of the option value for the help
422                false, // Options are usually optional …
423                stringOptHandler, // The value handler
424                false, // The option value is not multi-value
425                null // No special format
426            ) );
427
428        //---* Parse the command line *----------------------------------------
429        var retValue = false;
430        try
431        {
432            parseCommandLine( cliDefinitions, args );
433            retValue = true;
434        }
435        catch( final CmdLineException e )
436        {
437            err.println( e.getLocalizedMessage() );
438            printUsage( err, Optional.empty(), getClass().getSimpleName(), cliDefinitions );
439            retValue = false;
440        }
441
442        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
443        return retValue;
444    }   //  execute()
445

585
586    /**
587     *  The program entry point.
588     *
589     *  @param  args    The command line arguments.
590     */
591    @SuppressWarnings( "UseOfSystemOutOrSystemErr" )
592    public static final void main( final String... args )
593    {
594        try
595        {
596            final var argfile = new File( "./org.tquadrat.foundation.showcase/src/test/resources/argfile" );
597            assert argfile.exists() : "Cannot find file!";
598            final var args1 = new String [] { format( "@%s", argfile.getCanonicalFile().getAbsolutePath() ) };
599            final var application = new CodedCLI();
600            application.execute( args1 );
601
602            out.println( application.m_BigDecimalArg );
603        }
604        catch( @SuppressWarnings( "OverlyBroadCatchBlock" ) final Throwable t )
605        {
606            //---* Handle all previously unhandled exceptions here *-----------
607            t.printStackTrace( err );
608        }
609    }   //  main()
610}
611//  class CodedCLI
